name: Booyahg Whip

trait.name: Nimble Escape
text: The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Khurgorbaeyag's Gift
text: Khurgorbaeyag saw fit to gift this goblin with powers that enable it to dominate others. The goblin has 1d3 other goblin that slavishly obey its orders.

action.name: Scimitar
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

description: Source: Volo's Guide to Monsters p. 42
